items.impact: Provides a week of nutritious snacks for one child
Supplies educational materials for a classroom
Serves 10 families at our Thanksgiving meal
Sponsors a child for one month of care
Supports facility improvements and safety upgrades
Champions our mission as a Major Donor

waysToGive.title: Online Donation
waysToGive.description: Make a secure one-time or recurring donation through our online form.

waysToGive.title: Mail a Check
waysToGive.description: Send a check to: Project Annie, Inc., 625 W. 4th Ave., Tallahassee, FL 32303

waysToGive.title: Corporate Giving
waysToGive.description: Partner with us for corporate sponsorship, matching gifts, or workplace giving.

waysToGive.title: In-Kind Donations
waysToGive.description: Donate supplies, food, or services directly to support our programs.
